summary: This code specifies the required Python packages for the project. These include Numba, NumPy, PyTorch, Tqdm, More-Itertools, and Tiktoken. Additionally, it requires Triton version greater than or equal to 2.0.0 but less than 3, only on Linux platforms (x86_64 or linux2).

details.comment: This code specifies the required Python packages for the project. These include Numba, NumPy, PyTorch, Tqdm, More-Itertools, and Tiktoken. Additionally, it requires Triton version greater than or equal to 2.0.0 but less than 3, only on Linux platforms (x86_64 or linux2).
details.content:
numba
numpy
torch
tqdm
more-itertools
tiktoken
triton>=2.0.0,<3;platform_machine=="x86_64" and sys_platform=="linux" or sys_platform=="linux2"
